mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tableaux. Accomplis de tous les arts liberaux: contenans brieuement et clerement par singuliere methode de doctrine, vne generale et sommaire partition des dicts arts, amassez et reduicts en ordre pour le soulagement et profit de la ieunesse / Par Monsieur Christofle De Savigny
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Jean & François de Gourmont Freres
Savigny, Christophe de, approximately 1530-1608
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Par Iean & François de Gourmont freres, demeurants ruë Sainct Iean de Latran
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: [2] leaves, )(¹ A-LL¹, [1] leaf. Leaves EE, HH and II are missigned GG, KK and LL.
Text within ornamental borders; title and tableaux in an oval frame; explanatory text in border composed of strips of ornamental type.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: All missigned signatures have been corrected, in ink, in ViU copy. Inserted at end: title-page from the 1619 edition, "Reueu, corrigé, & augmenté de nouveau", with imprint: A Paris : Chez Iean Libert ..., 1619. On title-page: Ex Libris Touzée De Grand'Isle ... Parisiis 1739." Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 644.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Classification
Arts
